title: Other Resources
lead: More resources to learn about bitcoin.

links.title: BTC Sessions
links.description: BTC Sessions is geared towards helping you understand Bitcoin. Get the tutorials on wallets, hardware, security, exchanges and much more.

links.title: Lopp.net
links.description: Jameson's goal is to spread knowledge of crypto systems and liberating technologies.

links.title: Matt Odell
links.description: Matt focuses on bitcoin, distributed systems, and privacy.

links.title: Bitcoin Only
links.description: Vast collection of links to bitcoin only resources.

links.title: Bitcoiner.Guide
links.description: A collection of Bitcoin resources by BitcoinQnA

links.title: Bitcoin Q&A - Simple answers to your Bitcoin questions
links.description: Short and easy to digest answers to your most frequently asked Bitcoin questions.

links.title: Keep It Simple Bitcoin
links.description: Practical guides and tutorials to teach people how to interact securely and privately with Bitcoin.

links.title: Arman The Parman's free Bitcoin Guides
links.description: This site is dedicated to helping you progress your understanding of Bitcoin.

links.title: Btcinformation.org
links.description: Find all you need to know and get started with Bitcoin on btcinformation.org.

links.title: Bitcoin.org
links.description: Find all you need to know and get started with Bitcoin on bitcoin.org.

links.title: Bitcoin Design
links.description: The Bitcoin Design Guide is a reference for the design of bitcoin applications.
